Name: Don't Push Me
About the game: Square off against your friends in this life-or-death shoving simulator! 2 Player Local Competitive 1v1. Best played with gamepads. Otherwise, keyboard can be used, and controls are displayed on screen. Keybindings can be re-bound by using the text files in the installation directory. FEATURES 1 vs 1 - Local Player vs Player Competitive Play. The best way to play! 1 vs AI - Local training! AI vs AI - Watch two AI duke it out, for fun! To play ONLINE , utilize Steam's 'Remote Play Together' function. The Parsec application is also recommended. GOAL Shove your opponent into the spikes on either side of the arena by DASHING into them! Each MATCH is a 'Best of Five'. That is, each player has '3 lives', and the first person to lose all three lives to the spikes loses the match! MOVES JUMP and DASH DEFAULT CONTROLS If no controllers or gamepads are plugged in, the game will default to the following keys. You can rebind the default controls using the KeyboardBindings.txt file in the installation directory. Player 1 MOVEMENT/DIRECTION - W/A/S/D JUMP - G DASH - H Player 2 MOVEMENT/DIRECTION - Arrow Keys JUMP - ' (quote) DASH - ; (semicolon) Game By Jakeypoo, @jmanoclay Audio By Ian Smith
